
{{Client event}}
This event is triggered whenever a [[/ped.md|ped]] is damaged.
{{Note|This event is only triggered for peds that are streamed in}}
==Parameters==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
element attacker, int weapon, int bodypart [, float loss ]
</syntaxhighlight> 

*'''attacker''': A [[/player.md|player]] [[/element.md|element]] representing the attacker or [[/vehicle.md|vehicle]] [[/element.md|element]] (when a ped falls of a bike).
*'''weapon''': An integer representing the weapon ID the attacker used
*'''bodypart''': An integer representing the bodypart the ped was damaged
{{BodyParts}}
*'''loss''': A float representing the percentage of health the ped lost.

==Source==
The [[/event_system#Event_source.md|source]] of this event is the [[/ped.md|ped]] that got damaged

==Cancel effect==
If this event is [[/Event_system#Canceling.md|canceled]], then any damaging effects to the ped will cease.

==Example== 
This example cancels any damage done to peds
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function cancelPedDamage ( attacker )
	cancelEvent() -- cancel any damage done to peds
end
addEventHandler ( "onClientPedDamage", getRootElement(), cancelPedDamage )
</syntaxhighlight>
